data.comment: The first-half has come to a close in Rotterdam.
In the minute 46, Bas Nijhuis has blown to start the second-half.
Goal! Mark Van der Maarel gives Utrecht a 0-1 lead.
Justin Hoogma instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 64, Utrecht's Mark Van der Maarel has been booked in Rotterdam.
Lutsharel Geertruida is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Marcos Senesi.
In the minute 68, At De Kuip, Jordy Wehrmann has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Utrecht make their first substitution with Eljero Elia replacing Mimoun Mahi.
Luciano Narsingh is replacing Bryan Linssen for the home team.
In the minute 79, Rene Hake is making the team's second substitution at De Kuip with Othman Boussaid replacing Bart Ramselaar.
Rene Hake (Utrecht) is making a third substitution, with Sylian Aldren Mokono replacing Mark Van der Maarel.
Naoufal Bannis is replacing Nicolai Jorgensen for Feyenoord at De Kuip.
In the minute 86, The away team replace Sander Van de Streek with Urby Emanuelson.
The match has come to a close in Rotterdam. The final score is 1-1.
Eric Botteghin is on a sub for Jordy Wehrmann for Feyenoord.
